channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Gallery Factory Lite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Gallery Factory Lite

item.title: CVE-2023-0148|2023-02-06T19:59:22.291Z -- unknown -- gallery%20factory%20lite
item.description: The Gallery Factory Lite WordPress plugin through 2.0.0 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
